Class JoynService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsma.services.rcs.JoynService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CapabilityService, ChatService, ContactsService, FileTransferService, FileUploadService, GeolocSharingService, ImageSharingService, IPCallService, MultimediaSessionService, VideoSharingService

    public abstract class JoynService
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract joyn service
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET
